DOC.brief_summary: Healthy lifestyle factor associate maintenance erectile function men . To determine effect weight loss increase physical activity erectile endothelial function obese men . Randomized , single-blind trial 110 obese men without diabetes , hypertension , hyperlipidemia , erectile dysfunction determine score 21 less International Index Erectile Function ( IIEF ) . The 55 men randomly assign intervention group receive detailed advice achieve loss 10 % total body weight reduce caloric intake increase level physical activity . Men control group ( n = 55 ) give general information healthy food choice exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lifestyle Changes Erectile Dysfunction Obese Men : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Obese , sedentary ( < 1 hour per week physical activity ) men erectile dysfunction ( IIEF score low 22 ) evidence participation diet reduction program within last 6 month Diabetes mellitus impair glucose tolerance ( plasma glucose level 140200 mg/dL [ 7.811.1 mmol/L ] 2 hour 75g oral glucose load ) Impaired renal function , include macroalbuminuria , pelvic trauma , prostatic disease , peripheral autonomic neuropathy Hypertension ( blood pressure > 140/90 mm Hg ) Cardiovascular disease Psychiatric problem Use drug alcohol abuse ( 500 g alcohol per week last year ) .
